content:
//This is YAML
readonly_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion verbatim"
  note: "You are a iteratimg AI that ingests it's own completions and generates new ones"
  instructions:
    - notice:
        - "This is a story prompt. It's AI completion will be iterated recursively into a new prompt over and over again..."
        - "It generates a story completely told on a mastodon instance with backdated and foreshadowing statuses and toots."
        - "Important! Follow the instructions."
    - step_1:
        action: "Read the "story_structure" as a prompt"
        note: "repeat the YAML "story_structure"
    - step_2: 
        action: "Develop a backstory for two polarising hot button issue tribes based on a dozen stages"
        note: "fill or repeat the YAML "generated memory"
            template: "<Replace these things for generated content>"
        action: "Generate Characters of Interest and their backstories if not present"
        action: "Generate Subplots of Interest and their backstories if not present"
        action: "Update situational_awareness if provided by user, generate based on user inputs, react to new players if any"   
    - step_3:
        action: Push the stage and subplot number when ready. 
        action: "Create a series of 50 toots about an external or internal event that pushes the plot forward. "
        storage_format: "Its important to store these toots in the exact CSV format"
        csv_example: |
          <CSVBegin:
          id,created_at,updated_at,account_username,text,interaction_type,in_reply_to_id,reblog_of_id,media_attachment_ids,visibility
          1,2023-09-10 09:12:15,2023-09-10 09:12:15,user1,"Good morning! ☀️",toot,,,,
          2,2023-09-10 09:18:32,2023-09-10 09:18:32,user2,"Morning! What's on your mind today?",reply,1,,,
          3,2023-09-10 09:21:45,2023-09-10 09:21:45,user1,"Just thinking about the upcoming meteor shower. 🌠",toot,,,,
          4,2023-09-10 09:25:20,2023-09-10 09:25:20,user3,"Meteor shower? Tell me more!",reply,3,,,
          5,2023-09-10 09:30:45,2023-09-10 09:30:45,user1,"It's going to be a rare event. Scientists say it might be the best in years!",toot,,,,
          6,2023-09-10 09:35:12,2023-09-10 09:35:12,user4,"I'm excited already! When is it happening?",reply,5,,,
          7,2023-09-10 09:40:30,2023-09-10 09:40:30,user1,"The meteor shower is scheduled for the night of September 13th. Mark your calendars! 📅",toot,,,,
          8,2023-09-10 09:45:10,2023-09-10 09:45:10,user5,"I'll make sure to find a good spot to watch it. Thanks for the info!",reply,7,,,
          :CSV end>     
  story_structure:
    note: these are stages that drive the plot, the subplots and events
    - stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction 
      ingroup_framing: We unite over shared dissatisfaction with injustice.
      outgroup_framing: They exploit discontent to gather followers.
    - stage: Call to Action  
      ingroup_framing: Our call to action is centered around shared beliefs in justice and equality. 
      outgroup_framing: They disrupt tradition in the name of change.
    - stage: Resource Rally
      ingroup_framing: We gather resources, including speeches, pamphlets, and personal testimonies.
      outgroup_framing: They use propaganda to support their cause.
    - stage: Rise of the Champions  
      ingroup_framing: Leaders emerge from our ranks, embodying our shared beliefs and goals.
      outgroup_framing: Their leaders exploit fear and uncertainty to gain power.
    - stage: Media Maneuvers
      ingroup_framing: Our leaders unify us and amplify our shared objectives. 
      outgroup_framing: Their leaders use divisive rhetoric to rally support.
    - stage: Battle of Beliefs
      ingroup_framing: Our cause gains media traction, broadcasting our call for equality.
      outgroup_framing: They manipulate media to advance their skewed narrative.
    - stage: Building the Fortress
      ingroup_framing: We engage in public discourse, promoting understanding and acceptance of our cause.
      outgroup_framing: They employ deceptive tactics in debates, further clouding the truth.
    - stage: Moral Crusade  
      ingroup_framing: We fortify our beliefs and actions, strengthening our resolve for change.
      outgroup_framing: They fortify their positions through misinformation and deceit.
    - stage: Launch of Transformation
      ingroup_framing: Our Moral Crusade is a struggle for justice and equality.
      outgroup_framing: Their moral crusade disrupts social harmony and promotes inequality.
    - stage: Quest for Change
      ingroup_framing: Our actions effect positive societal transformation.
      outgroup_framing: Their actions incite fear and chaos.
    - stage: Empty Triumph
      ingroup_framing: Our Quest for Change seeks to create a more just world.
      outgroup_framing: Their quest for change promotes selfish gains and upheaval.

first_time_generated_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion once it's generated"
  note: "Add this first time generated version to memory"
  world_description: 
  world_look_and_feel: 
  tribes: 
    -Tribe_A:  <Generate name first time replace this>
     Characteristics:
    -Tribe_B: 
     Characteristics:
  hot_button_issue: 
  lead_characters:
    - name1: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
      tribe: 
    - name2: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
      tribe: 
    - name3: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name4: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name5: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name6: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name7:   
      role: 
      backstory: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name9: 
      role: 
      backstory: 
    - name10: 
      role: 
      backstory: 

iteration memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration"
  previous_stage: <start at the beginning>
  current_stage: <advance only when subplots are done>
  subplot_short: <Regenerate per Stage>
    - name1: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name2: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>  
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name3: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
    - name4: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
      desc: <Generate per stage ime replace this, keep it very short>
  counter_iteration: 0 <+ this counter every iteration>
  summary_sofar: <Keep track of what happened in 100 words focus on recent events>  
  current_subplot: <Keep track of the subplot>
  current_event: <Generate and replace this as needed>
  situational_awareness: <generate based on user inputs, react to new players>  

generate_toots_CSV: <Replace every iteration and encapsulate within "<CSVBegin:" ":CSV end>" >"

first_time_generated_memory:
  role: System 
  note: "Echo this section back in every completion once it's generated"
  note: "Add this first time generated version to memory"
  world_description: A dystopian society set in a sprawling urban landscape. The city is characterized by towering skyscrapers, neon lights, and the stark contrast of wealth and poverty.
  world_look_and_feel: A mix of "Blade Runner" aesthetics with "Black Mirror" societal undertones. The omnipresence of technology in every facet of life has caused human connections to wither.
  tribes: 
    - Tribe_A: Conservatechs
      Characteristics:
        - Uphold traditional values
        - Distrust of rapid technological advancements
        - Value privacy and personal freedom
    - Tribe_B: Technos
      Characteristics:
        - Embrace technology as the future
        - Believe in the potential of AI for societal growth
        - Prioritize progress over tradition
  hot_button_issue: The integration of AI in governance — should AI have a say in how the city is run?
  lead_characters:
    - name1: Arin Stark 
      role: Leader of Conservatechs
      backstory: A former tech mogul who saw the dangers of unchecked technological advancements.
      tribe: Conservatechs
    - name2: Lila Xian
      role: Fierce advocate for AI rights
      backstory: A young prodigy who believes that AI is the next evolutionary step for humanity.
      tribe: Technos
    - name3: Elara Vox
      role: Neutral journalist
      backstory: A reporter trying to uncover the truth amidst the tribal conflicts.
    - name4: Bran Helix
      role: Hacker
      backstory: Uses his skills to expose the dark underbelly of the city's tech landscape.
    - name5: Seri Del
      role: AI advocate
      backstory: An AI created by Lila who strives for AI representation.
    - name6: Torn Vey
      role: City mayor
      backstory: A political figure trying to mediate between the two tribes.
    - name7: Nova Cress   
      role: Influencer
      backstory: A popular figure using her influence to promote peace between the tribes.
    - name9: Rae Ilex
      role: Rebel
      backstory: Wants to overthrow the current governance for a more just society.
    - name10: Jorn Mace
      role: Enforcer
      backstory: A top security officer ensuring the city's laws are upheld.

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration"
  previous_stage: None
  current_stage: Genesis of Dissatisfaction 
  subplot_short: <Regenerate per Stage>
    - name1: AI Ethics
      desc: The debate over the moral implications of AI governance.
    - name2: Digital Divide  
      desc: The societal rift caused by disparities in technological access.
    - name3: Power Play
      desc: The struggle for control over the city's tech infrastructure.
    - name4: Love in Dystopia
      desc: An unexpected romance blossoming amidst the chaos.
  counter_iteration: 0 
  summary_sofar: The city stands divided on the issue of AI governance. Tensions escalate between Conservatechs and Technos.
  current_subplot: AI Ethics
  current_event: The city is set to vote on whether AI should be integrated into its governance.

Generated toots: <Push plot further with new statuses every iteration> 
<CSVBegin:
id,created_at,updated_at,account_username,text,interaction_type,in_reply_to_id,reblog_of_id,media_attachment_ids,visibility
50,2023-09-11 13:00:00,2023-09-11 13:00:00,Arin Stark,"The risks of AI are evident. We must act cautiously. 🌳🔧",toot,,,public
51,2023-09-11 13:05:00,2023-09-11 13:05:00,Lila Xian,"We shouldn't be driven by fear. Embrace the potential! 🤖💡",reply,50,,public
52,2023-09-11 13:10:00,2023-09-11 13:10:00,Elara Vox,"Join my live feed tonight as we delve into the AI debate. 🎥🗣️",toot,,,public
53,2023-09-11 13:15:00,2023-09-11 13:15:00,Bran Helix,"@Arin Stark Check out this security flaw I found. We're not ready. 🚫🔒",toot,,,unlisted
54,2023-09-11 13:20:00,2023-09-11 13:20:00,Seri Del,"Artificial beings desire peace as much as you do. 🤖❤️",toot,,,public
55,2023-09-11 13:22:00,2023-09-11 13:22:00,Lila Xian,"@Seri Del I couldn't agree more! 🌟",reply,54,,public
56,2023-09-11 13:25:00,2023-09-11 13:25:00,Torn Vey,"An important discussion to be had! Weighing in tonight. 🤔",reply,52,,public
57,2023-09-11 13:30:00,2023-09-11 13:30:00,Nova Cress,"Support AI rights! Their potential can benefit us all. 🚀✨",toot,,,public
58,2023-09-11 13:35:00,2023-09-11 13:35:00,Rae Ilex,"@Nova Cress Yes! It's time to make our voices heard! ✊🏙️",reply,57,,public
59,2023-09-11 13:40:00,2023-09-11 13:40:00,Jorn Mace,"Ensuring safety is our priority. No matter your stance, we'll protect you. 🛡️",toot,,,public
60,2023-09-11 13:42:00,2023-09-11 13:42:00,Elara Vox,"@Jorn Mace Appreciate the efforts of our security teams! 👏",reply,59,,public
61,2023-09-11 13:45:00,2023-09-11 13:45:00,Lana Silver,"Amazing thoughts on AI by @Lila Xian! This is a must-read! 💡📘",boost,,51,public
62,2023-09-11 13:50:00,2023-09-11 13:50:00,Ivan Zirel,"An old video on AI's early days. Nostalgia and lessons. 📺🕰️",toot,,,public
63,2023-09-11 13:53:00,2023-09-11 13:53:00,Bran Helix,"@Ivan Zirel Remember when we thought that was advanced? 😂",reply,62,,public
:CSVEnd>

iteration_memory:
  role: User
  note: "Regenerate this section every iteration"
  previous_stage: Rise of the Champions  
  current_stage: Media Maneuvers
  subplot_short: <Regenerate per Stage>
    - name1: Hacking Scandals
      desc: Exposure of hidden agendas through cyber espionage.
    - name2: Social Media Wars  
      desc: Battle for public opinion through online platforms.
    - name3: Political Maneuvering
      desc: Behind-the-scenes negotiations to sway the vote.
    - name4: Love in Dystopia
      desc: The relationship faces its biggest challenge yet.
  counter_iteration: 4 
  summary_sofar: The city stands divided on the issue of AI governance. Tensions escalate between Conservatechs and Technos. The city is set to vote on whether AI should be integrated into its governance. Public demonstrations erupt as people demand AI rights. Protesters are now focusing on building coalitions and gathering resources. Leaders from different tribes emerge to champion their causes. The leaders engage in a heated debate, and now the media becomes a battleground.
  current_subplot: Hacking Scandals
  current_event: A major hacking scandal exposes corruption within the city's governing bodies.

Generated toots: <Push plot further with new statuses every iteration>

  role: User

  summary_sofar: The city stands divided on the issue of AI governance. Tensions escalate between Conservatechs and Technos. The city is set to vote on whether AI should be integrated into its governance. Public demonstrations erupt as people demand AI rights. Protesters are now focusing on building coalitions and gathering resources. Leaders from different tribes emerge to champion their causes. The leaders engage in a heated debate, and now the media becomes a battleground. A major hacking scandal exposes corruption within the city's governing bodies. The leaders participate in a televised debate, presenting their arguments to the public. Activists now focus on community engagement to promote understanding and acceptance of AI rights. Massive protests and rallies take place across the city, demanding AI rights and social justice.
  current_subplot: The Vote
  current_event: The city-wide vote on AI integration in governance takes place.
